name: Capcom vs. SNK: Millennium Collection
overview: End the talk! Decide who's best! Two companies - one winner! Decide the match of the millennium using your favorite Capcom or SNK character across three games: Capcom Vs. SNK, Capcom Vs. SNK Pro and Capcom vs. SNK 2! Also includes the Capcom Taisen Fan Disk. This is a fan made compilation
